meanings.definition: A coat of cement or plaster applied to a masonry wall.
meanings.sent1: The parging on the wall protected it from the weather.
meanings.sent2: The old house had beautiful parging on its exterior.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat left paw prints in the wet parging on the wall.
meanings.sent4: The parging on the wall was like a shield against the elements.
meanings.sent5: The bright red parging stood out against the gray bricks.

meanings.definition: To apply a coat of cement or plaster to a masonry wall.
meanings.sent1: We need to parging the wall to make it more durable.
meanings.sent2: He spent the weekend parging the foundation of the house.
meanings.sent3: She decided to parging the wall herself, feeling like a DIY expert.
meanings.sent4: The workers parging the wall with precision and skill.
meanings.sent5: Parging the wall transformed its appearance completely.
